bool CSplashDialog::ShowSplashScreen ( CWnd *  pParentWnd,
double  splashTime = 10000.0,
double  stepTime = 1000.0 
) [static]

Show a splash screen.

Parameters:
pParentWnd - window with respect to which splash screen shoulg be aligned
splashTime - how long to wait until splash screen autohides [ms]
splashStep - 0 means not to show a timer bar; >0 show timer bar
